alert.note: Alert for Iowa; Lafayette (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 2:28AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Lafayette and southwestern Iowa Counties through 330 AM CDT... At 228 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Boscobel to near Fennimore to near Lancaster. Movement was southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dodgeville, Mineral Point, Darlington, Shullsburg, Belmont, Benton, Highland, Centerville, Linden, New Diggings, Elk Grove, Cobb, Rewey, Platte Mounds, Calamine, Lead Mine, Edmund, Blackhawk Lake Rec Area, and London. This includes U.S. Highway 151 between mile markers 23 and 47. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
